article_metadata.description: Ideas have the capacity to create and destroy, to bridge reality with the imaginary, and will outlive any one individual. In political terms, our state can simply be viewed as just that: an idea.

og.description: Ideas have the capacity to create and destroy, to bridge reality with the imaginary, and will outlive any one individual. In political terms, our state can simply be viewed as just that: an idea.
og.title: Sam Corey: American myth
